verse: The Restoration. This word came to Jeremiah from the Lord:
Thus says the Lord, the God of Israel: Write down on a scroll all the words I have spoken to you.

For indeed, the days are coming—oracle of the Lord—when I will restore the fortunes of my people Israel and Judah—oracle of the Lord. I will bring them back to the land which I gave to their ancestors, and they shall take possession of it.
These are the words the Lord spoke to Israel and to Judah:
On that day—oracle of the Lord of hosts—I will break his yoke off your neck and snap your bonds. Strangers shall no longer enslave them;
instead, they shall serve the Lord, their God, and David, their king, whom I will raise up for them.
